alert.note: Alert for Middle Rio Grande Valley, Albuquerque Metro Area; Northwest Plateau; West Central Plateau (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Heat Advisory issued July 16 at 2:34AM MDT until July 16 at 8:00PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...HEAT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO 8 PM MDT THIS EVENING... ...HEAT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM NOON TO 8 PM MDT MONDAY... * WHAT...For the first Heat Advisory, temperatures up to 101 expected. For the second Heat Advisory, temperatures up to 103 expected. * WHERE...Middle Rio Grande Valley including the Albuquerque Metro Area, Northwest Plateau, and West Central Plateau. * WHEN...For the first Heat Advisory, from Noon today to 8 PM MDT this evening. For the second Heat Advisory, from Noon to 8 PM MDT Monday. * IMPACTS...Hot temperatures may cause heat illnesses.
info.instruction: Take extra precautions when outside. Wear lightweight and loose fitting clothing. Try to limit strenuous activities to early morning or evening. Take action when you see symptoms of heat exhaustion and heat stroke.

area.areaDesc: Middle Rio Grande Valley, Albuquerque Metro Area; Northwest Plateau; West Central Plateau
